data.title: Welcome Card Application
data.text:
Get a Library Card

Brooklyn Public Library's card is free for anyone who lives, works, pays property taxes or goes to school in New York state. There is a limit of one library card per person.

1. Who is this card for?

Child ages 0-12

Teen ages 13-17

Adult 18+

2. Tell us about yourself

*Birthdate

*Name

I have a different legal first name

3. Where do you live?

Do you live outside New York State?

As of July 15, 2022, BPL is no longer offering out of state memberships. BPL library cards remain free for anyone who lives, works, pays property taxes or attends school in New York State. To proceed, please enter an eligible address below.

*Mailing Address

Apt

For a limited time, non-New York State residents ages 13-21 can apply for a free BPL eCard, providing access to our full eBook and audiobook collection as well as our learning databases. Learn more.

I am a NYC educator, homeschool or daycare instructor, school administrator, school librarian, academic librarian, or paraprofessional and I want to register for an educator card.

Tell us about your school

School Name

Other

School Address

I have another eligible address showing that I live, work, go to school, or own property in New York state.

Eligible New York Address

Out-of-state residents may apply for an out-of-state card. Your membership grants access to BPL's extensive eBook & audiobook and online resources collections. A non-refundable fee will be applied to your account, which must be paid within 7 days of application.

*Please select membership type:

New York applicants: to receive instant access to BPL's digital collection, please accept location sharing when prompted. You will receive a Welcome Card barcode and PIN immediately upon completing registration. Otherwise, simply proceed to activate your account at a BPL branch.

4. How should we contact you?

*What is the best way to remind you about upcoming due dates, holds, and overdue materials?

Email Text Phone call

Email address

Phone number

Text me a link to download the BPL Mobile App

I want to learn more about events and activities at the library for:

Birth to Five Years Kids Teens Adults Older Adults

Sign me up for Bookmark, the best of BPL's programs and events delivered every other week to my inbox.

By clicking the Submit button, I confirm that I have read and agree to abide by the policies of Brooklyn Public Library.
